content: What would you recommend as a presentation of the power of adding SMART-on-FHIR launch framework to an EHR or other data hosting that already supports FHIR? Meaning the presentation focuses on SMART value-add, not FHIR. Presuming FHIR has already caught... on.
And when you say presentation do you mean like a slide deck? Or do you mean what is the value proposition that SMART on FHIR offers above "just FHIR"?

I will take anything that hits the target... but my need might be best served by a video recording speaking to decision maker level people. A slide deck would be useful, I would try to do the deck justice. A text would be okay, but I likely already extracted that from the spec.
Did I just inspire another of your 5 minute videos??? That would be most excellent.
Sure, this would be a good topic. But the short story is: SMART provides the glue you need to build user-facing apps (single sign-on, scoped authorization, UX embedding, and context sharing).
If all you know is "my data host supports FHIR", you may not have any of these capabilities, or they may be implemented in non-standard ways, or "oddly standard" ways.
